dapps.name: Script IDE
dapps.description: Minima Script IDE for developing smart contracts
dapps.about: A powerful integrated development environment for writing and testing Minima smart contracts with KISSVM syntax highlighting and debugging tools.
dapps.release_notes:
# Script IDE v1.0.0

- Initial release
- KISSVM syntax highlighting
- Contract compilation
- Test execution environment

history.release_notes:

dapps.name: Block Explorer

dapps.about: A comprehensive block explorer for the Minima blockchain, allowing users to search transactions, view block details, and monitor network activity.
